Rule.Name: OceanAndroidApp_NativeLibraries
Rule.Description: Native shared library (.so) settings for Android application packaging

StringProperty.Name: OceanNativeSharedLibraries
StringProperty.Description: Native shared libraries (.so) inherited from the _use.props dependency chain. These are automatically copied to jniLibs during build.

StringProperty.Name: AdditionalNativeLibraries
StringProperty.Description: Additional native shared library (.so) files to include in the APK. Enter one filename per line, or separate with semicolons (e.g., libMyLib.so). Files are resolved against Native Library Search Directories. Libraries inherited from _use.props imports are included automatically.

StringProperty.Name: NativeLibrarySearchDirectories
StringProperty.Description: Directories to search for additional native libraries. Enter one directory per line, or separate with semicolons. Use MSBuild properties like $(OutDir) for paths.
